entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or drizzle. High 7.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to rain or periods of drizzle in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Fog patches late in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
